name: Validate director name displayed on program details page

testSteps.description: Given I am on IMDB home page
When I select Most Popular TV Shows from Movies, TV and Showtimes menu

children.description: Select option from first dropdown: Most Popular TV Shows

testSteps.description: And I click on The Walking Dead (2010) on Most Popular TV Shows page

children.description: Select tv show on most popular tv shows page: The Walking Dead (2010)

testSteps.description: Then I should see Creator: Frank Darabont on the program Details page

children.description: Verify director name: Creator: Frank Darabont

userStory.narrative:
I want to search for a TV program
So that i can see that in the search results

title: Validate director name displayed on program details page
